main event: Observers sighted a bright star-like object in the western sky on October 20, 1969 in Germantown, Ohio.
interesting points: The object displayed very erratic flight, looked like steam, and left a white light trail.
The witness may have seen some glow but could not tell for sure.
The object moved very quickly, appearing for only a few minutes before disappearing.
The witness wanted to observe the object more carefully but it was too brief.
The witness later reported the object moved from Germantown to Miamisburg, about 5 minutes away, and had a single bright bluish-white beaming light that looked nothing like a known aircraft.
sighted object: bright star-like object in the sky
